<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name>gr2 </name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns score for the given [[Side|side]]. MP Only.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''scoreSide''' side

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> side: [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_number <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[scoreSide]] [[west]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[score]], [[addScore]], [[addScoreSide]], [[getPlayerScores]]
</value></part></template>
